customfooter.overview: Our platform is structured to provide a seamless experience across various functionalities. Here's an overview:
customfooter.products: Products: Add, edit, and manage product listings.
customfooter.users: Users: Manage user accounts and their roles.
customfooter.statistics: Statistics: Monitor platform performance and metrics.
customfooter.viewOrders: Orders: View and manage your orders.
customfooter.wallet: Wallet: Manage your funds and transactions.
